alert.note: Alert for Carlton; St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 30 at 4:31AM CDT until May 30 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 AM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL ST. LOUIS AND CENTRAL CARLTON COUNTIES... At 430 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mahtowa, or 13 miles southwest of Cloquet, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public reports of hail up to one and a half inches in Moose Lake. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fond Du Lac Band Sawyer Area, Scanlon, Carlton, Fond Du Lac Band Brookston Area, Fond Du Lac Band Cloquet Area, Cloquet, Saginaw, Hermantown and Pike Lake Near Duluth. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
